page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: {POPULAR CHILDRENS PASTIMES } The most popular pastimes are outdoor games including activites such as football, playing out and bike riding. Watching television and using the computer are other very popular pastimes.Indoor sports such as swimming, judo and badminton are also popular.Many children take part in art and craft activities in their spare time.Other pastimes include playing with indoor games and belonging to clubs such as Cubs ,Majorettes , Brownies and Boys Brigade. {ADULTS PASTIMES } The most popular pastime is watching TV. The second most popular pastime is gardening.The third most popular pastime is going to the pub. The fourth most popular pastime is crafts such as knitting etc & reading. Other pastimes are DIY and playing sport.
